title: Ranil Jayawardena – 2022 Speech to Conservative Party Conference
author: admin
summary: The speech made by Ranil Jayawardena, the Secretary of State for Environment, Food and Rural Affairs, in Birmingham on 3 October 2022.
content:
I am delighted to be standing before you today, as your Secretary of State for the Environment, Food and Rural Affairs.
